May contain spoilers from Kingmaker **Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 24 **Usage** etched onto a weapon --- This weapon features stylized etchings of giants. A _giant-killing weapon_ deals an additional 1d6 mental damage on a successful Strike against a [giant](/Traits.aspx?ID=79). On a critical hit, the giant is also [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) until the end of your next turn. Giant-Killing **Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 24 **Price** 450 gp Giant-Killing (Greater) **Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 24 **Price** 6,000 gp --- Increase the additional mental damage to 2d6, and mental damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's mental resistance. On a critical hit, instead of being enfeebled 1, the giant must attempt a DC 34 Fortitude save with the following effects. **Critical Success** The giant is enfeebled 1 until the end of your next turn.
**Success** The giant is enfeebled 2 until the end of your next turn and takes 1d10 additional mental damage.
**Failure** The giant is enfeebled 2 for the next minute and takes 2d10 additional mental damage.
**Critical Failure** The giant is enfeebled 4 for the next minute and takes 4d10 additional mental damage.
name: Giant-Killing (Greater)
